doc.after: Broadcasting House in Portland Place London is the official headquarters of the BBC It is home to six of the ten BBC national radio networks BBC Radio 1 BBC Radio 1xtra BBC Asian Network BBC Radio 3 BBC Radio 4 and BBC Radio 4 Extra It is also the home of BBC News which relocated to the building from BBC Television Centre in 2013 On the front of the building are statues of Prospero and Ariel characters from William Shakespeare s play The Tempest sculpted by Eric Gill Renovation of Broadcasting House began in 2002 and was completed in 2013
